commentary: Bresnan to Stirling, OUT has Bairstow pulled off a run out? Sharp work if so. Yes, he has! A short-of-a-length delivery deflected down off Stirling's thigh pad, he wasn't sure where it had gone but was called through by Porterfield. The captain made it easily enough, but Stirling is well short at the non-striker's end as Bairstow makes a direct hit having run from behind the stumps
text: has Bairstow pulled off a run out? Sharp work if so. Yes, he has! commentary: Wood to Porterfield, OUT first wicket for Wood! It's a drag on by the Ireland captain. Back of a length outside off, Porterfield tries to cut but is cramped for room and gets a bottom edge into the stumps. The umpires check for the no-ball, it's very clse but a fraction of heel behind the line
